title: Snake Species Quiz
description: Slither into this quiz about the fascinating world of snakes and their unique traits

questions.question: Which snake is the longest in the world, capable of reaching lengths over 20 feet?
Which snake is the heaviest in the world, weighing up to 550 pounds?
Which venomous snake is the longest in the world, reaching lengths of up to 18 feet?
Which African snake is considered the fastest snake in the world, capable of reaching speeds of 12 mph?
Which North American pit viper has a distinctive rattle at the end of its tail made of keratin segments?
Which brightly colored venomous snake is mimicked by the harmless king snake, remembered by the rhyme 'Red touches yellow, kills a fellow'?
Which snake from Southeast Asia can flatten its body and glide through the air between trees?
Which cobra species is famous for being used by snake charmers in India and can spread its hood when threatened?
Which Australian snake has the most toxic venom of any land snake in the world?
Which non-venomous snake is one of the most popular pet snakes and comes in many color morphs including albino?
Which large constrictor snake is an invasive species causing ecological problems in the Florida Everglades?
Which snake gets its name from the white interior of its mouth that it displays as a warning?
Which constrictor found in Central and South America gives live birth rather than laying eggs?
Which small, harmless snake is commonly found in gardens across North America and has yellow stripes running along its body?
Which venomous snake from Africa is named for its extremely large fangs and is responsible for more snakebite fatalities in Africa than any other species?
